channel.title: MySQL on Wing
channel.description: Recent content in MySQL on Wing

item.title: 更加优雅地在Python测试代码中查询数据库
item.author: fy975713384@gmail.com (Pan, Feng)
item.description: 更加优雅地在 Python 测试代码中查询数据库 with connection: with connection.cursor() as cursor: sql = "SELECT `id`, `password` FROM `users` WHERE `email`=%s" cursor.execute(sql, ('webmaster@python.org',)) result = cursor.fetchone() -> db.from_(_ := Table("users")).select(_.id, _.password).where(_.email.eq("test")).execute().fetchone() 的过程。 一、基于 PyMySQL 的原始写法 来自官网的样例（经过简化） import

item.title: Mysql 日期时间操作
item.author: fy975713384@gmail.com (Pan, Feng)
item.description: Mysql 日期时间操作 时间戳 mysql> SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(), FROM_UNIXTIME(UNIX_TIMESTAMP()); UNIX_TIMESTAMP()|FROM_UNIXTIME(UNIX_TIMESTAMP())| ----------------+-------------------------------+ 1630134918 |2021-08-28 07:15:18.0 | 日期时间查询 当前日期时间查询 mysql> SELECT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, NOW(), LOCALTIME, LOCALTIMESTAMP, SYSDATE(); CURRENT_TIMESTAMP |NOW() |LOCALTIME |LOCALTIMESTAMP |SYSDATE() | ---------------------+---------------------+---------------------+---------------------+---------------------+ 2021-08-28 07:05:43.0|2021-08-28 07:05:43.0|2021-08-28 07:05:43.0|2021-08-28 07:05:43.0|2021-08-28 07:05:43.0| 当前日期查询 mysql> SELECT CURRENT_DATE, CURDATE(); CURRENT_DATE|CURDATE() | ------------+----------+ 2021-08-28 |2021-08-28| 当
